last_episode_to_air.name: Complete Mindf***
last_episode_to_air.overview: Fontana attempts to process the shocking loss of her friend. While in Hannibal, she must confront rumors about Christina Whittaker's family that can no longer be swept aside. The most promising lead yet sends Fontana to one more dig, but will she uncover the truth about what really happened to Christina Whittaker?

name: Relentless
overview: Christina Fontana follows a family searching for their missing daughter.

episodes.name: The Two Christinas
episodes.overview: A filmmaker joins the search for a missing girl in a race against time.

episodes.name: Fool Me Twice
episodes.overview: Fontana gets closer to Cindy to try to find out what she might be hiding.

episodes.name: Paradise Lost
episodes.overview: Fontana unearths Hannibalâ€™s secrets and confronts a dangerous suspect.

episodes.name: People Die Around Here
episodes.overview: Fontana shifts her focus to a new lead: the head of an organized crime group who may hold the key to Christina Whittaker's whereabouts. When a rogue search turns up possible evidence, Fontana isn't sure who she can trust - especially when shocking allegations about local law enforcement come to light.

episodes.name: The Devil and The Angel
episodes.overview: Fontana looks for answers after police do not pursue leads she has shared with them. Meanwhile, Fontana discovers dark truths about Christina Whittaker's past as she digs deeper into the family. Then, a devastating event blindsides everyone.
